DOC.brief_summary: Quality bystander cardiopulmonary resuscitation ( CPR ) affect patient survival . Quality professional CPR patient study detail , regularly report quality test manikin deteriorate dramatically within month train . Automated direct feedback CPR quality manikin bring quality back within couple minute . Similar feedback incorporate defibrillator also monitor quality CPR . We hypothesise quality professional clinical CPR improve feedback
DOC.brief_title: Quality Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Without With Defibrillator Feedback
DOC.detailed_description: Defibrillators monitor quality CPR via change thoracic impedance ( ventilation ) movement sternum employ accelerometer ( chest compression ) employ ambulance Akershus county ( Norway ) , Stockholm ( Sweden ) London ( UK ) . During phase 1 quality CPR monitor without feedback defibrillator . During phase 2 ambulance personnel receive feedback via defibrillator . During phase 3 ambulance personnel retrain particular attention quality problem become apparent phase 3 . Quality CPR continuously record defibrillator data collect sent via internet Laerdal Medical . All cardiac arrest data include survival record use standard datasets cardiac arrest research develop task force member organisations International Liaison Committee resuscitation ( Utstein guideline ) . The data annotate analyzed detail researcher University Oslo
